title: Liver disease
summary: The term "liver disease" applies to many conditions that stop the liver from working or prevent it from functioning well. Abdominal pain or swelling, yellowing of the skin or eyes (jaundice), or abnormal results ofliver function testsmay suggest you have liver disease. Related topics include: Martin P. Approach to the patient with liver disease. In: Goldman L, Cooney KA, eds.Goldman-Cecil Medicine. 27th ed. Philadelphia, PA: Elsevier; 2024:chap 132.
